src: Nwng’-no ani khajani Sajla, Nono’-no ang belai khe khá phurjago.
trg: You are my beloved Son; with you I am well pleased.

src: Norok sak-sakni tongdal tei bwkhano slái di, tei Kothoma kahamno poito khlai di.
trg: Repent and believe in the gospel.

src: Norok ani logi phai di, ang norokno á romna ya, tamo khe Kaitorni bagwi borok romnani se phrwng anw.
trg: Follow me and I will make you fish for people.

src: Siringcha wng di! O borokni bisingni ongkhorwi phai di!
trg: Be silent, and come out of him!

src: Nwng muchung khe ano ham rwui mano.
trg: If you are willing, you can make me clean.

src: Ham di, angbo ahaino nai-o.
trg: I am willing.

src: Chwlasa, nini bebak sumsok nakarjak kha
trg: Son, your sins are forgiven.

src: Ani logi phai di
trg: Follow me.

src: Kaham borokni bagwi daktor nang ya, hamya borokni bagwi se nango. Borok kahamrokno ang ringna phai ya, sumsok gwnangrokno se ringna phai-o.
trg: Those who are well have no need of a physician, but those who are sick; I have come to call not the righteous but sinners.

src: Rí kwchamo khoroksa phano rí kwtal thap ya; thap khe a rí kwtal kwchamno kichik rwui kákhlai rwnai, hakhe kwpla teibo uarnai.
trg: No one sews a piece of unshrunk cloth on an old cloak; otherwise, the patch pulls away from it, the new from the old, and a worse tear is made.

src: Sabat salo omo hai khlai laimani chini kerongni raidano swbaima klai-o.
trg: Is it lawful for the Sabbath day?

src: Jotono nukna tẃi khe oro bacha di.
trg: Stand up here in front of everyone.

src: Sabat salo bú samung khlai kha hwn khe sói wngma klai: Kaham khlaima da eba hamya khlaimani? Khoroksani langma mwthangmani da sói eba butharmani?
trg: Is it lawful to do good or to do harm on the Sabbath, to save life or to kill?

src: Nini yak pholok di.
trg: Stretch out your hand.

src: Nwng’-no Kaitorni Sajla!
trg: You are the Son of God!

src: Soitan bini bisingo tongo! Mwtai hamya bokhorokni phan bai se bo bororokni aroni mwtai hamyarokno rwkhlai-o.
trg: He has Beelzebul, and by the ruler of the demons he casts out demons.

src: Sabo ani ama? Sabo ani takhuksong?
trg: Who are my mother and my brothers?

src: Khna di!
trg: Listen!

src: Khunju gwnangrok hwn kheba o kókno khna thung!
trg: Let anyone with ears to hear listen!

src: Norok khnaui tongmarokno bwkha rwui uansuk di.
trg: Pay attention to what you hear

src: Bebak huijak tongmarok tikhlaiwi phunukjak anw. Bebak bisingni manwirokno kariui sini rwjak anw.
trg: For there is nothing hidden, except to be disclosed; nor is anything secret, except to come to light.

src: Norok khunju tong khe o kókno khna di!
trg: If anyone has ears to hear, let them listen!

src: Nokbar bai twi suda bini kók khnaui ma tongo?
trg: Even the wind and the sea obey him?

src: Chwng bórokni bisingo habwi tháng anw.
trg: Let us enter them.

src: Subrai nini bagwi bwswk kaham khlai kha bórokno sa bai di.
trg: Report to them what the Lord has done for you, and how he has had mercy on you.

src: Ani bwrwima thwina nai tong kha. Nwng phaiwi bini saka-o kisa yak bera phai ja di. Hakhe bo ham anw tei kaham kwrwng khe tongwi man anw.
trg: My little daughter is at the point of death. Come and lay your hands on her, so that she may be made well and live.

src: Ang bini kamchwlwi kisa ma tang kheno ham anw
trg: If I but touch his clothes, I will be made well.

src: Ta kiri di; poito simi khlai di.
trg: Do not fear, only believe.

src: Talitha Kum!
trg: Little girl, get up!

src: Bahai khe bo omo tẃi aswk elem man kha?
trg: Where did this man get all this?

src: Diyari bini kamiyungni borok bai, bini sandairok bai tei bini nokni bororokno karwi kubun bebak jagani bororok bai’-no bórom rwjago.
trg: Prophets are not without honor, except in their hometown, and among their own kin, and in their own house.

src: Yaklaprok káui mano, tamo khe rí bárarok ta tlang di.
trg: But to wear sandals and not to put on an extra tunic.

src: Ano tabukno mairango khlaiwi baptisma rwnai Johonni bokhorok rw phai di
trg: I want you to give me at once the head of John the Baptist on a platter.

src: Ang bai baksa phai di; siring siring jaga-o chwng simi tháng lai anw. Aro-o chwng kisa lenglaui man anw.
trg: Come away to a deserted place all by yourselves and rest a while.

src: Bórokno chá rwna bagwi norok kisa chámung rw gra di.
trg: You give them something to eat.

src: Ta uana di; omo ang se! Ta kiri di.
trg: Take heart, it is I; do not be afraid.

src: Bórokni slái swkang tongwi tháng langnairokni raidaroknobo bórok rákhogo.
trg: And there are also many other traditions that they observe, the washing of cups, pots, and bronze kettles.

src: Bórok yak sú yaui’-no mai chá-o. Tamoni bagwi bórok omo hairok khlai?
trg: Why do your disciples not live according to the tradition of the elders, but eat with defiled hands?

src: O bororok kók bai ano bórom rw-o, phiya bórokni thani-o ang mungsa buya.
trg: This people honors me with their lips, but their hearts are far from me

src: Ani thani tháng di. Mwtai hamya nwsajwkno yakarwi tháng kha.
trg: Go home to your daughter, for the demon has left her.

src: Ephata.
trg: Be opened.

src: Tamo wngwi norok soidomni samung naina hwn?
trg: Why does this generation ask for a sign?

src: Hus wng di! Norok Pharisairokni chuan tei Herodni chuan bai hus khe tong di.
trg: Watch out! Beware of the yeast of the Pharisees and the yeast of Herod.

src: Tabuk nu da nuk kha?
trg: Can you see anything?

src: Bororok ano sabo tamo hwn?
trg: Who do people say that I am?

src: Kaitor naimarokno nwng nangjak ya. Borok nangjakkukmano se nwng torjago.
trg: You are setting your mind not on divine things but on human things.

src: Norokni bisingo ani sagri wngna muchungnairok bórok sak sakni kók ta uansuk thung tei bini krus balwi ani logi phai thung.
trg: If any want to become my followers, let them deny themselves and take up their cross and follow me.

src: Bo’-no ani Sajla, bonono ang belai hamjak kugo. Bini kók khna di!
trg: This is my Son, the Beloved; listen to him!

src: Tamono tẃiwi tokra rw laiwi tong?
trg: What are you arguing about with them?

src: A chwraino ani thani tubu di!
trg: Bring him to me.

src: Norok khe tamo wngwi a mwtai hamyano rwkhlai man li ya sla?
trg: Why could we not cast it out?

src: Chwngno kebeng ya Borok bo chini bwkhak se.
trg: Whoever is not against us is for us.

src: Bono ta mwthak di. Ani mung bai ha-o nuk ya samung kotor kotor khlainairok ano daktino hamya sa glak.
trg: Do not stop him; for no one who does a deed of power in my name will be able soon afterward to speak evil of me.

src: Sóm belai kaham. Phiya abo pwrap ya wngwi tháng khe, nwng abono tei kwprap khlaiwi man phi glak. Hakhe nini bisingni a sóm kahamno ta swkwma di. Tei kwchang kwchang khe tong lai di.
trg: Salt is good; but if the salt has lost its saltiness, how can you season it? Have salt in yourselves, and be at peace with one another.

src: Borok khoroksa bini hikno kagwi rwmani abo sói da?
trg: Is it lawful for a man to divorce his wife?

src: Chwrai bwsarokno ani thani rohor di. Bórokno ta kasu di, tamoni hwnma le omo tẃi chwrai bwsa hai bororokni bagwi’-no Kaitorni ha.
trg: Let the little children come to me; do not stop them; for it is to such as these that the kingdom of God belongs.

src: Borok ta buthar di, buitali-buitala ta wng di, ta khok di, tatal ta sa di, ta phemlok di, nwma nwphano bórom khlai di….
trg: You shall not murder; You shall not commit adultery; You shall not steal; You shall not bear false witness; You shall not defraud; Honor your father and mother.
